text:
making them more susceptible to suggestions and manipulation.

   • Cathy O'Brien: An American woman who claims to have been subjected

    to MKUltra's hypnosis experiments. She has written about her

    experiences in a book titled "Trance-Formation."

   • Mark Phillips: A former CIA operative who claims to have worked on the

    MKUltra project. He has spoken publicly about the use of hypnosis and

    other techniques to control human behavior.

Survivors and Whistleblowers
